title: ConfigResponse
description: Top level config type for core module.

automatically_add_cw20s.description: If true the contract will automatically add received cw20 tokens to its treasury.

automatically_add_cw721s.description: If true the contract will automatically add received cw721 tokens to its treasury.

banner.description: A CID to fetch the banner from IPFS

dao_uri.description: The URI for the DAO as defined by the DAOstar standard https://daostar.one/EIP

logo.description: A CID to fetch the logo from IPFS
